title: Fast Resized Image Download (Python 3)
description: This is fast image downloader using this trick: https://www.kaggle.com/c/landmark-recognition-challenge/discussion/49703 And you can change target size that you prefer. Reference: https://www.kaggle.com/c/landmark-recognition-challenge/discussion/48895 For 256,256 this should be 22 GB For 224,224 this should be 16.8 GB For 139,139 this should be 6.5 GB For 128,128 this should be 5.5 GB For 96,96 this should be 3.1 GB For 64,64 this should be 1.4 GB
